trans-unit.source: PowerShell script to create an Application Insights resource
trans-unit.target: PowerShell script to create an Application Insights resource

trans-unit.source: Automate creation of Application Insights resources.
trans-unit.target: Automate creation of Application Insights resources.

trans-unit.source: PowerShell script to create an Application Insights resource
trans-unit.target: PowerShell script to create an Application Insights resource

trans-unit.source: Application Insights is in preview.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights is in preview.

trans-unit.source: When you want to monitor a new application - or a new version of an application - with [Visual Studio Application Insights](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/application-insights/), you set up a new resource in Microsoft Azure.
trans-unit.target: When you want to monitor a new application - or a new version of an application - with [Visual Studio Application Insights](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/application-insights/), you set up a new resource in Microsoft Azure.

trans-unit.source: This resource is where the telemetry data from your app is analyzed and displayed.
trans-unit.target: This resource is where the telemetry data from your app is analyzed and displayed.

trans-unit.source: You can automate the creation of a new resource by using PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: You can automate the creation of a new resource by using PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are developing a mobile device app, it's likely that, at any time, there will be several published versions of your app in use by your customers.
trans-unit.target: For example, if you are developing a mobile device app, it's likely that, at any time, there will be several published versions of your app in use by your customers.

trans-unit.source: You don't want to get the telemetry results from different versions mixed up.
trans-unit.target: You don't want to get the telemetry results from different versions mixed up.

trans-unit.source: So you get your build process to create a new resource for each build.
trans-unit.target: So you get your build process to create a new resource for each build.

trans-unit.source: Script to create an Application Insights resource
trans-unit.target: Script to create an Application Insights resource

trans-unit.source: Output
trans-unit.target: Output

trans-unit.source: App Insights Name = erimattestapp
trans-unit.target: App Insights Name = erimattestapp

trans-unit.source: PowerShell Script
trans-unit.target: PowerShell Script

trans-unit.source: What to do with the iKey
trans-unit.target: What to do with the iKey

trans-unit.source: Each resource is identified by its instrumentation key (iKey).
trans-unit.target: Each resource is identified by its instrumentation key (iKey).

trans-unit.source: The iKey is an output of the resource creation script.
trans-unit.target: The iKey is an output of the resource creation script.

trans-unit.source: Your build script should provide the iKey to the Application Insights SDK embedded in your app.
trans-unit.target: Your build script should provide the iKey to the Application Insights SDK embedded in your app.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to make the iKey available to the SDK:
trans-unit.target: There are two ways to make the iKey available to the SDK:

trans-unit.source: In [ApplicationInsights.config](app-insights-configuration-with-applicationinsights-config.md):
trans-unit.target: In [ApplicationInsights.config](app-insights-configuration-with-applicationinsights-config.md):

trans-unit.source: `<instrumentationkey>`*ikey*`</instrumentationkey>`
trans-unit.target: `<instrumentationkey>`*ikey*`</instrumentationkey>`

trans-unit.source: Or in [initialization code](app-insights-api-custom-events-metrics.md):
trans-unit.target: Or in [initialization code](app-insights-api-custom-events-metrics.md):

trans-unit.source: `Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility. TelemetryConfiguration.Active.InstrumentationKey = "`*iKey*`";`
trans-unit.target: `Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility. TelemetryConfiguration.Active.InstrumentationKey = "`*iKey*`";`

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
